text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: ……Haaa.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: (The more and more I think about it, the more it seems like I don't know anything about Trainer-san)
『I didn't think you'd just head home』
『Since you don't like to give up, Rob Roy』
『Since you don't like to give up, Rob Roy』
『Rob Roy. What's your dream?』
『Rob Roy. What's your dream?』

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san understands me…… they're trying to understand me…… but I'm only thinking about myself.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Even though I'm the one with a hero's name……

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: ……Ah. T-this won't do. Instead of thinking about something like this, I should do something more productive……!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: (Right, I want to know more about Trainer-san. Rather than just imagining it, I want to know the real Trainer-san……)

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: (But even if I say that, just asking them 『Tell me more about yourself』 feels weird…… and embarrassing)

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Hyaah!? Ah, eh, ah, T-Trainer-san……! G-good afternoon. Umm…… what a coincidence, are you on a walk?
choice_data_list: I was thinking of doing some shopping

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: (! C-could this be!? A chance to learn more about Trainer-san……!?)

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: ……M-me too. So, um…… if it's okay, c-could…… could I go together with you!?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: As expected, this bookstore's selection of books is great because it's really big……! There's lots of new releases and they keep a good stock――

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Huh? Where's Trainer-san……!? Oh no, I was so distracted by the books――……?

text_block_list.name: Unfamiliar Man
text_block_list.text: I had a hard time figuring out what to do. Really, thank you very much!

text_block_list.name: Unfamiliar Man
text_block_list.text: In that case, let's confirm it one more time. So it's that escalator over there――

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: (……maybe they needed directions? Trying to find a certain shop? And when they needed help, Trainer-san stepped in……)

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: (Yeah, yeah. That other person seems relieved. I get it, since Trainer-san is easy to talk to!)

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: (Considerate, and kind…… Ehehe. So Trainer-san really is the kind of person I thought they were)

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Sorry about earlier. We got separated at the book store……

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: ……Trainer-san, you read books pretty often, don't you? You had those really thick books sitting on your desk.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: I've always thought it but, it seems like you're doing a lot of studying, and working hard.
I tried remembering what was on my desk that would make Zenno Rob Roy say that. It's true there were some books with covers on them. Those were――

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Eh, manga? Not technical manuals?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: ……s-so that's what they were! I read a lot of manga too. Next time, tell me what those manga are about, okay!?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Um…… t-that's right. Earlier, that guy was talking to you, right?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Was he asking you where a shop was? Trainer-san is kind so you're easy to talk to――
choice_data_list: Oh, you mean that gym promoter?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: G-gym promoter?
He told me that even though he had talked to a lot of people, none of them had even visited.
choice_data_list: He gave me a coupon for a free trial

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Oh…… Ohhh……! That's nice, it feels good to be able to move your body, after all!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: (Aaah, I've done it now! To keep talking like that without confirming things first…… is rude isn't it?)

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: (But, it's true that Trainer-san is always working hard and is kind……)

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: …………Sorry, about various things. Speaking so enthusiastically like that……
Enthusiastically…… she probably means…… about thinking those manga were technical manuals, and thinking I was giving directions.
A hard-working, kind person. It was a misunderstanding because she saw me that way――

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Eh?
choice_data_list: I'll work hard to be like that

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san……
Zenno Rob Roy seemed a little down but, I didn't think she needed to worry.
If that's what being a 『Trainer』 meant to her, then I'd make that my goal.
And if someday, I could become like that――
choice_data_list: I want to live up to that

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: ……! Trainer-san……

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: (So that's what they were thinking……)

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: (As I thought, Trainer-san is kind. ……But)

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: (Right now, about Trainer-san…… doesn't that mean I'm pushing my ideals on them……?)

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: (I'm happy they're thinking about me. The kindness of trying to become my ideal…… is heart-warming)

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: (But…… living up to my one-sided ideals. I don't want Trainer-san to feel forced in to it)
While gazing at the sunset, I feel that I want to do my best to get closer to that ideal――
Zenno Rob Roy seemed to be troubled with complex emotions as she gazed down at the orange-tinted asphalt.
